H0.text: Harvard University is situated in which American State. New York

H1.text: Harvard University is situated in which American State. California

H2.text: Harvard University is situated in which American State. Florida

H3.text: Harvard University is situated in which American State. Mass.

A4.text: Harvard University is a private Ivy League research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, United States.

A5.text: The 209-acre (85 ha) main campus of Harvard University is centered on Harvard Yard, colloquially known as 'the Yard', in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
